resources.string: Bluetooth access is required to display the camera preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Bluetooth permission is available. Starting preview.
Bluetooth permission was granted. Starting preview.

Bluetooth could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the Bluetooth is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when Bluetooth access has been disabled).
This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime.\nClick the button below to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.
